snippet: The composer described this chamber piece, to be presented at St. Peter’s, as an encounter between Germany and Greece imagined by a mad poet.
lead_paragraph: The composer described this chamber piece, to be presented at St. Peter’s, as an encounter between Germany and Greece imagined by a mad poet.

headline.main: Hans Werner Henze’s ‘Kammermusik 1958’ Gets a New Staging
headline.print_headline: A Chamber Paean to Insane Beauty
